dc_description_s: The Department of Public Works (DPW) collects holiday trees and greenery every winter between December 26 and January 8; they are then composted. Trees and greenery collected after January 8 are collected with the trash as space permits in the truck. Residents are instructed to please remove ornamentsThe Chief Technology Office shares service requests data feeds that come through http://311.dc.gov and the Mayor's 311 call center. These are locations for Illegal fireworks service requests in the last 30 days.
dct_spatial_sm: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
dc_title_s: Holiday Tree Collections: Washington, D.C., Last 30 Days
